p:
To capture rapidly emerging COVID-19 science, all publication types (eg, peer-reviewed research, editorials, and preprints) were included in this review. Evidence was identified primarily through a search for publications with a “treatment” tag in the National Library of Medicine’s LitCovid literature hub
5
,
6 through June 29, 2020. A review of citations within these articles identified additional relevant articles. Studies were selected if they contained clinical data on COVID-19 therapeutics with near-term availability. A clinical trial landscape assessment for emerging therapies was performed by searching ClinicalTrials.gov
7 for recruiting/open interventional trials on June 29, 2020, using a condition/disease query of COVID-19, SARS-CoV-2, and 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV).
